name: Portofilio
desc: My latest project - my fresh portfolio. I created it with ASTRO.JS, GLIDE.JS and AOS.

name: Vue dashboard
desc: This app simulates simple dashboard for your daily duties. You can add notes, reminds, expenses, tasks or expenses. I created it with VUE3 composition api, PINIA, VUETIFY and AXIOS at front. I used EXPRESS.JS, JOI.DEV, PRISMA.ORM and MYSQL for my API.

name: Fitapp
desc: This app allow you to monitor your daily nutritional values. I made it with NUXT2, VUETIFY and AXIOS at front and EXPRESS.JS to create API and connect it to MYSQL database.

name: Frontend challanges
desc: This project contains some of frontend mini challanges. I made challanges in vanilla Javascript.

name: Old portfolio
desc: This is my first portfolio project. I created it with VUE3 composition api and ANIMEJS.

name: Smart Home Interface
desc: This app simulate, interface of smart home. Made with VUE2, Interact.js and a little bit of TypeScript

name: To do app v2
desc: So that was my first app, which I made in VUE2. This is version 2, rebuilded specially for my first EXPRESS.JS app.

name: Express backend
desc: My first server app made with EXPRESS.JS.

name: Calendar app
desc: This app, simulates calendar where you can add tasks, to every day you want. I created it with VUE2, without any calendar libraries.

name: NBA stats
desc: This app allow you to check historical stats from nba games or single player stats. I created it with VUE2 and free basketball api

name: Money Converter
desc: This app allows you to convert currencies. I created it with VUE2 and free data currency api.

name: TIC TAC TOE
desc: Project of simple game that everyone knows. I created it with JAVASCRIPT.

name: TODO app
desc: This project is simple CRUD app, which I created with VUE2

name: TAI project
desc: This is a project for one of my study subjects. I made it with PHP, HTML and CSS

name: landing pages
desc: This repo contains projects of landing pages, which I made, when I was learning HTML and CSS
